extension.name: Content - EasyDiscuss
extension.author: imarklee
extension.description: This plugin adds a discussion at the bottom of the article allowing the articles to be linked to EasyDiscuss

field.name: allowed_components
field.label: Allow comments on component
field.description: Specify which components are allowed separated by a comma. Eg: com_content,com_easyblog

field.name: category_storage
field.label: Where should the article be stored?
field.description: Select which category should the article be stored in.

field.name: include_category
field.label: Fetch articles from these categories
field.description: Select the category that you want the plugin to appear in.

field.name: exclude_category
field.label: Exclude articles from these categories
field.description: Select the category that you do not want the plugin to appear in.

field.name: exclude_articles
field.label: Exclude article id's
field.description: Separate each article id with a comma e.g: 1,2,3. Leave blank to not exclude any articles

field.name: readmore_in_post
field.label: Show read more in post
field.description: If enabled, a read more link will be appended to the discussion post.

field.name: frontpage_tools
field.label: Frontpage tools
field.description: Show or hide the frontpage tools.

field.name: frontpage_show_discussion
field.label: Show discussion link
field.description: If enabled, a discussion link will be displayed in the front page

field.name: frontpage_show_hits
field.label: Show hits
field.description: If enabled, the hits will be displayed in the frontpage.

field.name: frontpage_alignment
field.label: Frontpage alignment
field.description: Set the position of the hits and discuss links on the frontpage.

field.name: show_discussion_link
field.label: Show link to discussion in form
field.description: If enabled, users will be able to see the Go to discussions link.

field.name: items_count
field.label: Total replies to display
field.description: Set the number of items to be displayed in the responses section.

field.name: allow_reply
field.label: Allow reply
field.description: If enabled, users will be able to submit a reply directly.

field.name: allow_likes
field.label: Allow likes
field.description: If enabled, users will be able to like the content.

field.name: show_online_users
field.label: Show online users
field.description: If enabled, users that are viewing the content will also be displayed.

field.name: login_provider
field.label: Login provider
field.description: Select which login to use for the login link.

field.name: registration_provider
field.label: Registration Provider
field.description: If enabled, users that are viewing the content will also be displayed.
